alert.note: Alert for Pershing (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:17PM PDT until June 06 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Pershing County in west central Nevada... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 316 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oreana, or 7 miles northeast of Lovelock, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, fencing and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Oreana and Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112). HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
